    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>

          <title>
            <string language="sl">Šola nekoč in danes</string>
            <string language="en">School - past and present</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Schule - hinter und Geschenk</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">École - après et présent</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Escola - após e presente</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scuola - oltre e presente</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Σχολείο - προηγούμενο και παρόν</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Escuela - más allá de y presente</string>
          </title>
          <language>sl</language>
          <description>
            <string language="sl">Učenje in poučevanje se je od svojih začetkov do danes zelo spremenilo. Učenci pri družbi v 4. r primerjajo današnji pouk s tistim, ki so ga poznali njihovi starši in stari starši. Veliko izvejo s pomočjo lastnega raziskovanja in pogovori s svojimi starši in starimi starši. Njihove ugotovitve lahko zelo lepo povzamemo z izdelavo plakata, kamor učenci ustrezno razporedijo pripravljene aplikacije. Svojo odločitev za razvrščanje seveda tudi pojasnijo.</string>
            <string language="en">Difference between school systems in the past and in the present (strictness, discipline, textbooks, ...)</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">šola</string>
            <string language="en">school</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">pouk</string>
            <string language="en">lesson</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">učenje</string>
            <string language="en">learning</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">učitelj</string>
            <string language="en">teacher</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">učilnica</string>
            <string language="en">classroom</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Unterschied zwischen Schulsystemen in der 
Vergangenheit und im Geschenk (Strictness, Disziplin, Lehrbücher...)</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Différence entre les systèmes scolaires dans le
passé et dans le présent (sévérité, discipline, manuels...)</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Diferença entre sistemas de escola no passado e 
no presente (strictness, disciplina, textbooks...)</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Differenza fra i sistemi scolastici nel passato e
nel presente (severità, disciplina, manuali...)</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Διαφορά μεταξύ των σχολικών συστημάτων στο παρελθόν 
και στο παρόν (αυστηρότητα, πειθαρχία, εγχειρίδια...)</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Diferencia entre los sistemas escolares en el 
pasado y en el presente (exactitud, disciplina, libros de textos...)</string>
          </description>
